Published October 30 2014

Interview with Slack CEO Stuart Butterfield

Interview with Slack CEO Stuart Butterfield — Mr. Butterfield: “I think it’s hard in the moment to know exactly why it’s [Slack’s] working. Just like Google vs. Alta Vista. At the moment it was difficult to explain, but it’s relatively easy to put your finger on it retroactively.” Smart company, run by a smart guy.

Enjoy your day.
